posts.title: SEC Announces Men's Basketball 2022-23 Schedule
posts.content:
The Southeastern Conference announced Arkansas’s 2022-23 SEC men’s basketball season schedule this week. Who’s pumped? 

  • Games: There are 18 games on the calendar, not including the SEC-Big 12 Challenge at Baylor University and the 2023 SEC Tournament in Nashville from March 8-12. Arkansas’s season will open on December 28 at LSU. 
  • At home: There will be nine home games this season. The first one is on January 4 against Missouri, and the regular-season finale will be versus Kentucky on March 4. Season tickets are already sold out, but you can virtually watch the games at the Bud Walton Arena here!

Click HERE for more information.

posts.title: Weekend Roundup
posts.content:
Happy weekend everyone! We’ve compiled a list of happenings you might enjoy: 

  • Bike: Tour de Tacos is tomorrow, starting at 7a in Bentonville. 
  • Game on: Watch the Razorback football and volleyball teams at their home games this weekend. 
  • Parade: Participate in the Centerton Day Parade on Saturday.
  • Automobiles: The 51st Annual Antique Autos in the Ozarks is at Pine Mountain Village in Eureka Springs this weekend. 
  • Keep it beautiful: The City of Bentonville is hosting a Clean the Streets Day tomorrow from 9-noon. 
  • Role play: The Fayetteville Public Library is hosting a Medieval/Fantasy LARP Day tomorrow. 
  • Fundraiser: A “Vintage Affair for MS” is happening at the Record in Bentonville today from 6-9p. 
  • Sing: Acclaimed gospel singer Fred Hammond will perform in Fayetteville at Christian Life Cathedral on Sunday. 

Have fun and be safe! See you Monday!

posts.title: Ledger Announces Coffee Shop Partner
posts.content:
Ledger in Bentonville announced its “Coffee Shop and Grab and Go” partner yesterday: Airship Coffee. 

  • Bike city: The local coffee shop and Ledger seem to be a perfect blend, with bikes being a throughline of Airship’s story and Ledger being the first bikeable building in the world. Both companies have a mission to knit together a cycling-based community through a “live, work, meet” experience. 
  • Quick stop: The new Airship cafe in Ledger will be just off the bike breezeway of downtown Bentonville, and it will have a bike-up window for anyone to experience the new centerpiece of town. In celebration of the partnership, Airship and Ledger are gifting three winners a special bundle through a social media giveaway.

Read the Ledger story HERE.

posts.title: Welcoming Week Begins Today
posts.content:
With days of events inspired by Welcoming America, Northwest Arkansas is participating in Welcoming Week, which officially starts today! 

  • Purpose: Welcoming Week NWA is presented by Engage NWA and will bring the community together to affirm the importance of welcoming and inclusive places in the mission of collective prosperity. 
  • Events: To kick off the week, there is a launch and community opening celebration at The Jones Center, coffee and treats for all at Experience Fayetteville, a patio concert series at Bike Rack Brewing, a movie screening at Thaden, and more, all today! 

Click HERE for the full calendar of Welcoming Week NWA events.

posts.title: Cool Jobs in NWA
posts.content:
Looking for a job? Check out these positions posted to our community board:

  • Sugar Daddy's is looking for a Cook*
  • TheatreSquared has a position open for a Human Resources Director

Have a job you're looking to fill? Post it here!

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Shire Post: Celebrate the grand opening and tour NWA's most magical coin mint this Saturday at Shire Fest!*
  • Evening out: Join the Fayetteville Public Library for its A Midsummer Night’s Dinner on Friday, September 16.*
  • Program: Tickets are available for the Cherishing Children Annual Dinner & Awards Presentation. Get yours here.*
  • Employed: All Arkansas metros saw year-over-year job gains in July. 
  • Money moves: Walmart recently announced a partnership with UnitedHealth Group.
  • Tell it: Have a story? We have room in the newsletter for you! Check out our deals HERE.

*Content is sponsored
